summary: A set of character customization options provided as RaceMenu overlays including texures from several very talented modders.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F6vBOuK.png[/IMG][/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FcL9481.png[/IMG]
This is a compilation of body customization textures from several talented mod authors made available as RaceMenu overlays. It started when I converted Rost3's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15766/?]body freckle[/url] source to an overlay for personal use and got a handful of personal messages asking if I could share it. After getting in touch with the author I released the overlays to moderate success and started getting requests for more overlay options, beginning this compilation project.

The idea behind this compilation is to gather open source textures or those provided with permission and convert them into RaceMenu overlays to expand the options available to us in character creation without having to modify the base body texture, therefore making each PC's own look unique. There are already a handful of great overlay mods on the nexus that provide tattoos and warpaints such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28740/?]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41210/]Warpaint[/url], but very few overlay options for body customization such freckles and pubic hair variation. This mod aims to remedy that.

If you have any overlay suggestions or are an author willing to contribute your own assets please don't hesitate to leave a comment.

To apply an overlay navigate to one of the overlay tabs in RaceMenu (the last four on the right), select an overlay slot and press 'T' to select a texture.
(Full list of options in readme)

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mcMtwPT.png[/IMG]
[color=red]***Make Sure You have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] and its requirements first! Also be sure to install "Loose Base Scripts from the RaceMenu page as well!***[/color]

1. Download mod for the body of your choice
2. Extract contents to a temporary location
3. Merge this mod's data folder with your own

Alternatively download with NMM or the mod manager of your choice.

UPDATING
If you are updating from a previous version uninstall the old one as the esps and texture directories have changed. Install the new esp of your choice and once in game you'll need to open the overlay menus and reapply each overlay currently on your character to refresh its texture.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xSopHLA.png[/IMG]
Rost3 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15766/?]body freckle texures[/url]
SvarogNL for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27352/?]mole textures and pube variations[/url]
Kraken973 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14322/]tanline textures[/url]
expired6978 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
HeavyDude for help with texture editing
Bethesda for Skyrim
author: TheOniNinja
